meanings.definition: The highest academic degree awarded by a university or college.
meanings.sent1: She proudly displayed her collection of doctorates on the wall.
meanings.sent2: Many professors have earned multiple doctorates in their fields.
meanings.sent3: The cat claimed to have doctorates in napping and bird watching.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for learning was so strong that she pursued doctorates in various subjects.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the wisdom of those who held doctorates.

meanings.definition: To confer the highest academic degree upon someone.
meanings.sent1: The university will doctorates her during the commencement ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The professors doctorates their students after years of hard work.
meanings.sent3: The magician tried to doctorates the rabbit out of the hat, but it didn't work.
meanings.sent4: The chef's secret recipe will doctorates him as a master in the culinary world.
meanings.sent5: The king decided to doctorates the knight for his bravery in battle.
